official-title.#text:
To amend the William Wilberforce Trafficking Victims Protection Reauthorization Act of 2008 to
			 require consultation with States before awarding grants or contracts for
			 housing facilities for unaccompanied alien children.

header.#text:
Requiring consultation with State and local elected officials and a public hearing before awarding
			 grants or contracts for housing facilities for unaccompanied alien
			 children

text.#text:
